job.title: System Engineer - Voice Technology (Remote)
job.description: vroom is an innovative endtoend ecommerce company that is revolutionizing the car buying experience our scalable datadriven technology brings all phases of the vehicle buying and selling process to consumers wherever they are and offers an extensive selection of vehicles transparent pricing competitive financing and contactfree athome pickup and delivery we have experienced tremendous growth and have become a disruptive force in the automotive industry vroom is an exciting dynamic workplace and theres no better time to join the team than right nowltbrgtltbrgtwe are seeking a ltstronggtvoice system engineerltstronggt to be responsible for the stability and configuration of our contact center and phone systems this overlaps between our five and ringcentral cloud services with a strong focus on maintaining best practice deployments creating repeatable standards and policiesprocedures that support those standardsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtcollaborate with key stakeholders on the cx team to plan changes based on business needs and scale inside of our contact center environment ltligtltligtcollaborate with the other it operations team to respond to outages and issues ltligtltligttrack and coordinate changes to the voice systems with key stakeholders in the businessltligtltligtcreate and ensure the regular delivery of reports and metrics relating to the voice systems at vroom ltligtltligtprovide deep dive troubleshooting on endpoint machines that arent running voice systems properly ltligtltligtassist with project workloads and interface with business units to streamline workflows of various systems relating to the contact centerltligtltligtcreate documentation around it standards at vroom following best practices and collaborate on associated policies and procedures relating to those standardsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtqualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligthands on voice technology engineering ltligtltligtdeep knowledge of general it troubleshooting procedures ltligtltligtability to collaborate with peers and coworkers as well as other departments and end users ltligtltligtcomprehensive knowledge of contact center environments for yearsltligtltligtfamiliarity with change management operations at enterprise scaleltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtpreferred skillsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtexperience as a senior escalation point for helpdesk for yearsltligtltligtfamiliarity with ringcentral ltligtltligtknowledge of five for yearsltligtltligtfamiliarity with sfdcltbrgtltligtltulgtwe value your personal growth and will gladly train you on any of our technologies that you dont currently have ours is a culture where your voice will be heard and youll be able to see the result of your workltbrgtltbrgtwere one of the few players in the ecommerce automotive space as a member of our crew you will become an industry expertltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtbenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthis fulltime role offers competitive compensation health dental and vision insurance a k plan fully companypaid short term disability long term disability and life insurance access to a healthcare concierge service with virtual visits and annualized days of paid vacationltbrgtltbrgtbut our biggest benefit is being part of a lowego high performing team thats transforming the used car market into a modern online and datadriven industry we are looking for people who want to be a part of a contemporary startup culture what gets us out of bed is working with talented people on a mission that mattersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcommitment to diversity and equal employment opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtvroom is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to creating a work environment where all employees can find their drive to do that we champion a workplace where each and every person is treated with dignity and respect and is valued for their unique perspective and contributions our values of speed service progress employees engagement and development are only possible in an environment where every individual has the ability to bring their whole selves to work and contribute fullyltbrgtltbrgtvrooms policy is to maintain a working environment that encourages mutual respect promotes harmonious and congenial relationships between employees and is free from all forms of discrimination and harassment of any employee or applicant for employment or service provider by anyone including supervisors coworkers vendors or clients harassment and discrimination in any manner or form is expressly prohibited there is no tolerance for discrimination or unequal treatment of any kind on the basis of race color religion creed gender sex sexual orientation gender identity or expression pregnancy sexual and reproductive health decisions national origin age disability genetic information marital status or civil partnershipunion status familial status military or veteran status predisposition or carrier status domestic violence victim status alienage or citizenship status unemployment status sexual violence or stalking victim status caregiver status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtthis practice applies to all terms conditions and privileges of employment including but not limited to recruitment selection promotion demotion transfer layoff rehire termination of employment development and training compensation benefits and retirementltbrgtltbrgtplease review our privacy and ccpa policies here ltbrgtltbrgt
